parameters.name: search_type
parameters.description: The type of resource to return

get.description:
Search for resources
* of the specified type
* that are visible to the authenticated user, and
* contain the specified test
List references to the assays that are visible to the authenticated user

post.description: Create an assay containing the data sent

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The assay to be fetched, updated or deleted

patch.description: Patch the specified assay with the specified information

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version of the data file to get

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version of the model to get

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version of the presentation to get

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version of the sop to get
